data.title: Classic Crosby, Stills, Nash & Young Album, Déjà Vu, Gets a 50th Anniversary Release Date
data.meta_description: It has been rumored for a bit that a 50th Anniversary edition of Déjà Vu by the inimitable Crosby, Stills, Nash & Young band was nearby. And happen it will. With appropriate information still unavailable
data.text:
It has been rumored for a bit that a 50th Anniversary edition of Déjà Vu by the inimitable Crosby, Stills, Nash & Young band was nearby. And happen it will. With appropriate information still unavailable for a full report, the vinyl LP edition is now on a calendar. I’m sure that a CD set will be following soon enough.

On May 14, the LP edition will be made available to fans of the title. In short order, I fully expect the other editions to emerge.

More to come.
